oneOf: This field must be one of the following values: ${values}
notOneOf: This field } must not be one of the following values: ${values}
str_length: This field must be exactly ${length} characters
str_min: This field must be at least ${min} characters
str_max: This field must be at most ${max} characters
str_matches: This field must match the following: "${regex}"
str_email: This field must be a valid email
str_url: This field must be a valid URL
str_trim: This field must be a trimmed string
str_lowercase: This field must be a lowercase string
str_uppercase: This field must be a upper case string
num_min: This field must be greater than or equal to ${min}
num_max: This field must be less than or equal to ${max}
num_lessThan: This field must be less than ${less}
num_moreThan: This field must be greater than ${more}
num_notEqual: This field must be not equal to ${notEqual}
num_positive: This field must be a positive number
num_negative: This field must be a negative number
num_integer: This field must be an integer
date_min: This field field must be later than ${min}
date_max: This field field must be at earlier than ${max}
noUnknown: This field field cannot have keys not specified in the object shape
arr_min: This field field must have at least ${min} items
arr_max: This field field must have less than or equal to ${max} items
